dmca.title: Cease & Desist - Microsoft Corp.
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Richard LeBlanc 
Sent: Thursday, March 01, 2007 9:14 AM
To: Andrea Almeida
Cc: Joseph Horzepa
Subject: Cease & Desist - Microsoft Corp.

 

 

 

Sincerely,

 

Richard P. Le Blanc III, Esq.

Associate Counsel

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc./

Everyones Internet, Ltd.

835 Greens Parkway, Suite 150

Houston, Texas 77067

713.579.2815  Tel 

713.942.8621  Fax

rileblanc@theplanet.com

 

 

 

 

 

--------------------------------------------------------

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:

This e-mail and any files transmitted with it are confidential and are
intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are
addressed.  This communication may contain material protected by the
attorney-client privilege.  If you are not the intended recipient or the
person responsible for delivering the e-mail to the intended recipient,
be advised that you have received this e-mail in error and that any use,
dissemination, forwarding, printing, or copying of this e-mail is
strictly prohibited.  Please notify ThePlanet.com Internet Services,
Inc. at either (713) 579-2800 or at legalresponse@theplanet.com
<mailto:legalresponse@theplanet.com>  and destroy all copies of this
message and any attachments.  You will be reimbursed for reasonable
costs incurred in notifying us.  Thank you.

 

________________________________

From: canoncolor@ev1.net [mailto:canoncolor@ev1.net] 
Sent: Thursday, March 01, 2007 8:20 AM
To: Richard LeBlanc
Subject: Attached Image
